title: Oregon Caves National Monument & Preserve: Junior Ranger Trail Buttons
body: Junior Ranger Trail Buttons         Collect all four Junior Ranger trail buttons!   You can earn Junior Ranger trail buttons upon completion of activity sheets while hiking any one of the trails on the Monument. You can download and print these trail button activities sheets too so you are prepared before you come!  Cliff Nature Trail, 353 KB pdf file Old Growth Trail, 380 KB pdf file Big Tree Trail, 960 KB pdf file No Name Trail, 427 KB pdf file  Hiking Trails Find out more about the hiking trails on the Monument.
